name: Spider-Man Action Figure
details: The Spider-Man Action Figure brings your favorite web-slinging hero to life. This highly detailed figure stands 12 inches tall and features multiple points of articulation for dynamic poses. It comes with interchangeable hands, web accessories, and a display stand. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 4 and above.

name: Captain America Shield
details: Become a true Avenger with the Captain America Shield! This premium role-playing toy is a full-scale replica of Captain America's iconic shield. It features adjustable straps for a comfortable fit and is made with durable materials. Perfect for cosplay or display. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 6 and above.

name: Black Widow Stealth Suit
details: Gear up for covert missions with the Black Widow Stealth Suit! This action-packed toy includes a detailed Black Widow figure dressed in her stealth suit, complete with accessories like batons and pistols. The figure features multiple points of articulation for posing and play. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 5 and above.

name: Hulk Smash Hands
details: Unleash your inner Hulk with these incredible Hulk Smash Hands! Slide your hands into these oversized gloves and get ready for epic smashing action. Made with soft and durable materials, these hands make smashing sounds upon impact. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 3 and above.

name: Thor's Mjolnir Hammer
details: Wield the power of Thor with this authentic Mjolnir Hammer! This premium role-playing toy features intricate detailing and comes with electronic lights and thunder sound effects. Lift the hammer and feel the power of the God of Thunder. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 6 and above.

name: Iron Spider Web-Shooter
details: Gear up like Iron Spider with this cool Web-Shooter! Slip it onto your wrist and shoot web projectiles just like the beloved Marvel character. The set includes a gauntlet with a built-in shooter and a refillable cartridge of web projectiles. Suitable for Marvel fans aged 5 and above.

name: Batman Utility Belt
details: Equip yourself with the Batman Utility Belt and become the Dark Knight! This versatile belt features compartments for storing Batarangs, a grappling hook, and other crime-fighting gadgets. It also includes sound effects and a detachable cape. Suitable for DC fans aged 5 and above.

name: Wonder Woman Sword and Shield
details: Embrace the power of Wonder Woman with her iconic Sword and Shield! This role-playing set includes a realistic sword and shield adorned with Amazonian designs. The sword features sound effects, and the shield can be worn or used for display. Suitable for DC fans aged 6 and above.

name: Superman Action Figure
details: Bring the Man of Steel home with the Superman Action Figure! This highly detailed figure stands 12 inches tall and features multiple points of articulation. It comes with a removable cape and interchangeable hands for various poses. Suitable for DC fans aged 4 and above.

name: Harley Quinn Funko Pop
details: Add some mischief to your collection with the Harley Quinn Funko Pop! This adorable vinyl figure showcases Harley Quinn's signature red and black outfit, complete with her playful expression. It stands approximately 4 inches tall and comes in a window display box. Suitable for DC fans and Funko Pop collectors of all ages.

name: Flash Lightning Bolt Backpack
details: Zip around like the Fastest Man Alive with the Flash Lightning Bolt Backpack! This stylish and functional backpack features the iconic lightning bolt symbol of the Flash. It has multiple compartments, adjustable straps, and is made with durable materials. Perfect for school, work, or everyday adventures. Suitable for DC fans aged 8 and above.

name: Green Lantern Power Ring
details: Join the ranks of the Green Lantern Corps with the Green Lantern Power Ring! This replica ring features the iconic green design and is made with high-quality materials. It lights up and emits a green glow when activated. Channel your willpower and defend the universe. Suitable for DC fans aged 6 and above.

name: Wonder Woman Action Figure
details: Unleash the power of Wonder Woman with this action figure! Standing at 6 inches tall, this highly articulated figure features accurate detailing and comes with her iconic Lasso of Truth and shield. Perfect for collectors and fans of the DC Comics superheroine.

name: Batman Utility Belt Kit
details: Gear up like the Dark Knight with this Batman Utility Belt Kit! The kit includes a utility belt with adjustable straps, detachable pouches, and a Batarang. It also comes with a grappling hook and smoke pellets. Perfect for role-playing or completing your Batman cosplay.

name: Superman Logo T-Shirt
details: Show your support for the Man of Steel with this Superman Logo T-Shirt! Made with soft and comfortable fabric, this t-shirt features the iconic Superman logo on the front. Available in various sizes for both adults and kids. Perfect for everyday wear or as a gift for Superman fans.

name: Hellboy Deluxe Action Figure
details: Unleash the power of Hellboy with this deluxe action figure! Standing at 7 inches tall, this highly detailed figure features multiple points of articulation and comes with interchangeable hands, a removable trench coat, and his iconic Right Hand of Doom. Perfect for collectors and fans of the Dark Horse comic series.

name: The Umbrella Academy Poster Set
details: Decorate your space with The Umbrella Academy Poster Set! This set includes a collection of high-quality posters featuring the main characters from the popular Dark Horse comic series. Each poster showcases unique artwork and measures 18x24 inches. Perfect for fans of The Umbrella Academy.

name: Lady Death Collectible Statue
details: Bring the iconic Lady Death to your collection with this stunning collectible statue! Standing at 12 inches tall, this meticulously crafted statue captures the essence of the powerful character from the Dark Horse comic series. Made with high-quality materials, it is a must-have for Lady Death fans and collectors.

name: Concrete: Strange Armor Graphic Novel
details: Immerse yourself in the world of Concrete with the Strange Armor Graphic Novel! This captivating story follows the adventures of Ron Lithgow, a man trapped in a concrete body with extraordinary strength. Written by Paul Chadwick, this critically acclaimed Dark Horse comic series is now collected in this graphic novel edition.

name: Barb Wire Vinyl Figure
details: Add the tough and fearless Barb Wire to your collection with this vinyl figure! Standing at 8 inches tall, this stylized figure features Barb Wire in her signature outfit, complete with her weapon of choice. Perfect for fans of the Dark Horse comic series and collectors of vinyl figures.

name: Sin City Playing Cards
details: Experience the gritty world of Sin City with this deck of playing cards! Each card features stunning artwork inspired by Frank Miller's iconic Dark Horse comic series. Whether you're a fan of poker or collector of unique playing cards, this set is a must-have for Sin City enthusiasts.
